source.name: Hotels in Washington DC
source.description: Hotel locations. The dataset contains locations and attributes of Hotels, created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies.

datasets.name: Hotels in Washington DC
datasets.description: Hotel locations. The dataset contains locations and attributes of Hotels, created as part of the DC Geographic Information System (DC GIS) for the D.C. Office of the Chief Technology Officer (OCTO) and participating D.C. government agencies.
